TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PagerSettings extends System.Object implements class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public NotInheritable Class PagerSettings Implements IStateManager
public ref class PagerSettings sealed : System::Web::UI::IStateManager

summary.span: 表示支援編頁的控制項中分頁控制項的屬性。

span.span: Represents the properties of the paging controls in a control that supports pagination.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援分頁的控制項 (例如， ，並控制項) 可以顯示一組控制項呼叫*呼叫器*，讓使用者瀏覽控制項內的頁面。Controls that support pagination (such as the , , and controls) can display a set of controls called *the pager* that allows the user to navigate the pages within the control. 類別會使用這些控制項來呈現的頁面巡覽區屬性。The class is used by these controls to represent the properties of the pager. 一般情況下，物件會儲存在`PagerSettings`控制項的屬性。In general, the object is stored in the `PagerSettings` property of the control. 您可以設定的屬性，以自訂頁面巡覽區物件。You can customize the pager by setting the properties of the object. 頁面巡覽區支援數種不同的顯示模式。The pager supports several different display modes. 若要指定要在其中顯示頁面巡覽區模式，請設定屬性。To specify the mode in which to display the pager, set the property. 下表描述不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一頁及下一頁按鈕。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一步-頁面上下, 一步 頁面中，第一頁和最後一頁按鈕。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last -page buttons.| ||直接編號連結按鈕存取頁面。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||編號的連結，第一個連結和最後一個連結 按鈕。Numbered-link, first-link, and last-link buttons.| 當屬性設定為， ，或您可以自訂非數值按鈕的文字，藉由設定下表所示的屬性的值。When the property is set to the , , or value you can customize the text of the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一頁按鈕的文字。Text for the first-page button.| ||[上一頁] 按鈕的文字。Text for the previous-page button.| ||要為下一頁按鈕的文字。Text for the next-page button.| ||最後一頁按鈕的文字。Text for the last-page button.| 或者，您也可以藉由設定下表所示的屬性顯示非數值按鈕的影像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties as shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||要為上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||要為下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||要為最後一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 當設定為影像屬性時，對應的文字屬性會作為影像的替代文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，當屬性設定時，所指定的文字屬性會顯示為影像的替代文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 當屬性設定為或是的值，您可以指定要設定顯示頁面巡覽區中的頁面按鈕數目屬性。When the property is set to the or value, you can specify the number of page buttons to display in the pager by setting the property. 在頂端、 底端，或同時頂端和底部的控制項可以顯示頁面巡覽區。The pager can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of a control. 若要指定的頁面巡覽區的位置，設定屬性。To specify the position of the pager, set the property. 若要顯示或隱藏頁面巡覽區，請使用屬性。To show or hide the pager, use the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中所包含的物件屬性自訂按鈕的頁面巡覽列中所顯示的文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the object that is contained in the property to customize the text of the buttons that are displayed in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用建構函式建立的新執行個體類別。Use the constructor to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 建構函式通常由控制項開發人員提供分頁支援在自訂控制項時。The constructor generally is used by control developers when providing paging support in a custom control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ FirstPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.FirstPageImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定要為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 要為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為或是值，請使用屬性來指定第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以藉由設定顯示的第一頁按鈕文字屬性而非屬性。As an alternative, you can display text for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果並屬性值都設時，影像會顯示與屬性做為影像的替代文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的頁面巡覽區資料列中的第一頁按鈕影像控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the first-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

value.span: 預設值是」&l t;<"，這會轉譯成"<<"。

span.span: The default is "<<", which renders as "<<".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為或是值，請使用屬性來指定要為第一頁按鈕顯示的文字。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the first-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以藉由設定顯示第一頁按鈕的影像屬性而非屬性。As an alternative, you can display an image for the first-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果並屬性值都設時，影像會顯示與屬性做為影像的替代文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用來自訂頁面巡覽列中的第一頁按鈕顯示的文字屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the first-page button of the pager row in a control. summary.span: 取得或設定在支援分頁的控制項中顯示頁面巡覽區控制項時所用的模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the mode in which to display the pager controls in a control that supports pagination.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援分頁的控制項提供多個模式中顯示分頁控制項。Controls that support pagination provide multiple modes in which to display the paging controls. 使用屬性指定的模式。Use the property to specify the mode. 下表描述分頁控制項，不同的模式。The following table describes the different modes for pagination controls. |模式Mode|描述Description| |----------|-----------------| ||上一頁及下一頁按鈕。Previous-page and next-page buttons.| ||上一個頁面、 下一頁，第一頁和最後一頁 按鈕。Previous-page, next-page, first-page, and last-page buttons.| ||直接編號連結按鈕存取頁面。Numbered link buttons to access pages directly.| ||編號 和 第一個連結和 最後一個連結按鈕。Numbered and first-link and last-link buttons.| 當屬性設定為， ，或值，您可以藉由設定下表所示的屬性指定非數值按鈕的自訂文字。When the property is set to the , , or value, you can specify custom text for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||第一頁按鈕的文字。Text for the first-page button.| ||[上一頁] 按鈕的文字。Text for the previous-page button.| ||要為下一頁按鈕的文字。Text for the next-page button.| ||最後一頁按鈕的文字。Text for the last-page button.| 或者，您也可以藉由設定下表所示的屬性顯示非數值按鈕的影像。As an alternative, you can also display images for the non-numeric buttons by setting the properties shown in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||要為第一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the first-page button.| ||要為上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.| ||要為下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the next-page button.| ||要為最後一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。The URL to an image to display for the last-page button.| > [!NOTE] > 當設定為影像屬性時，對應的文字屬性會作為影像的替代文字。When an image property is set, the corresponding text property acts as the alternate text for the image. 例如，當屬性設定時，所指定的文字屬性會顯示為影像的替代文字。For example, when the property is set, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定頁面巡覽區資料列的控制項應顯示的數值按鈕。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that the pager row for a control should display numeric buttons. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/CS/PagerSettingsNumericcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/VB/PagerSettingsNumericvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定當 屬性設定為 或 值時，要在頁面巡覽區中顯示的頁面按鈕數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of page buttons to display in the pager when the property is set to the or value.

value.span: 要在頁面巡覽區中顯示的頁面按鈕數目。

span.span: The number of page buttons to display in the pager.

value.span: 預設值為 10。

span.span: The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為或是值，請使用屬性來指定要顯示在頁面巡覽區中的頁面按鈕數目。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the number of page buttons to display in the pager. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示五個的頁面按鈕的頁面巡覽列中，每次控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display five page buttons at a time in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/CS/PagerSettingsNumericcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsNumeric#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsNumeric/VB/PagerSettingsNumericvb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The is set to a value that is less than 1.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指定顯示頁面巡覽區的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the location where the pager is displayed.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定用來顯示頁面巡覽區的位置。Use the property to specify the location at which to display the pager. 下表描述不同的位置。The following table describes the different positions. |位置Position|位置Location| |--------------|--------------| ||控制項的下方。The bottom of the control.| ||控制項的頂端。The top of the control.| ||在頂端和底部的控制項。At both the top and bottom of the control.| 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示頁面巡覽列底部控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the pager row at the bottom of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 設定成不是其中一個 值。

summary.span: 取得或設定要為上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 要為上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image to display for the previous-page button.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為或是值，請使用屬性來指定要為上一頁按鈕顯示影像的 URL。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the URL to an image to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以藉由設定顯示上一頁按鈕的文字屬性而非屬性。As an alternative, you can display text for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果並屬性值都設時，影像會顯示與屬性做為影像的替代文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來顯示的頁面巡覽區資料列中的 [上一頁] 按鈕的影像控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display an image for the previous-page button in the pager row of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/CS/PagerSettingsImagescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsImages#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsImages/VB/PagerSettingsImagesvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為或是值，請使用屬性來指定要為上一頁按鈕顯示的文字。When the property is set to the or value, use the property to specify the text to display for the previous-page button. > [!NOTE] > 或者，您可以藉由設定顯示 [上一頁] 按鈕的影像屬性而非屬性。As an alternative, you can display an image for the previous-page button by setting the property instead of the property. 如果並屬性值都設時，影像會顯示與屬性做為影像的替代文字。If the and properties are both set, the image is displayed with the property acting as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support ToolTips, this text is also displayed as a ToolTip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來自訂頁面巡覽列中的 [上一頁] 按鈕的顯示文字控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager row in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/CS/PagerSettingsTextcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[PagerSettingsText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/PagerSettingsText/VB/PagerSettingsTextvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 在 物件的屬性變更值時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a property of a object changes values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性的每次引發事件物件變更的值。The event is raised each time a property of a object changes values. 事件通常由支援頁面巡覽區的設定變更時，重新繫結至控制項的資料分頁的資料繫結控制項。The event commonly is used by data-bound controls that support pagination to rebind the data to the control when the pager settings change. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否支援分頁的控制項中顯示分頁控制項。Use the property to specify whether the paging controls are displayed in a control that supports pagination. 若要隱藏分頁控制項，請設定屬性設`false`。To hide the paging controls, set the property to `false`. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，可隱藏頁面巡覽區資料列時控制項處於編輯模式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to hide the pager row when a control is in edit mode.
